item.title: Demystifying Low Latency Audio on Android @Droidcon APAC
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: Droidcon APAC ‘20, Online Abstract Enabling an enhanced audio experience for your users is the topmost priority for developers who build audio processing apps. Android, however, holds dark secrets about low latency audio, thus making it harder for developers to build responsive audio apps and user experiences.
item.dc:creator: Nishant Srivastava
